Available for sale are the following cards (SEE MY OTHER POSTS FOR ADDITIONAL CARDS):

PORTRAITS:

T206 - Doc Casey [Piedmont 350/25] - SOLD

ACTION POSES:

T206 - Charlie Hemphill [Piedmont 350/25] - SOLD
T206 - Jerry Freeman [Sweet Caporal 350/25] - SOLD
T206 - Fred Snodgrass (Batting) [Piedmont 350/25] - SOLD [CARD ADDED 8.21.2024]
T206 - Fred Snodgrass (Catching) [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - SOLD [CARD ADDED 8.21.2024]
T206 - Jimmy Sheckard [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - SOLD [CARD ADDED 8.21.2024]
T206 - Ed Reulbach [Sweet Caporal 350-460/25] - SOLD [CARD ADDED 8.21.2024]
T206 - Wilbur Goode [Piedmont 150/25] - SOLD
T206 - John Frill [Piedmont 350-460/25] - SOLD

Please add $5 for shipping.

If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

Sending pm


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
